channel.title: Owner b1g th13f has logged in
channel.description: I was wonder how i can get my server to say "Owner-MYUSERNAME has logged in when i log in. Anyone know how? i've tried a few thing's, still doesnt work.

item.title: Owner b1g th13f has logged in
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

Not everyone has

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “mod, " +playerName+ " has logged in”;

Idiot, that’s why I picked something that most servers have.

Read full topic
item.source: Owner b1g th13f has logged in

item.title: Owner b1g th13f has logged in
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

um or you could just do this
find in client.java

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "mod, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }
then add

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "YOUR MESSAGE"; }

Read full topic
item.source: Owner b1g th13f has logged in

item.title: Owner b1g th13f has logged in
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

Find SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

In client.java and add it underneath.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner b1g th13f has logged in
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Here’s an example of mine:

SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Rawr64 Me")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " Holy Crap Owner Rawr64 has logged in! Run!!";

Read full topic
